text: @spottedpuffer I'm at the cricket. The Govt is matching $ for $ the money raised by Cricket Aus & through the Premier's Appeal today. JG
@kerrinish Just not true. The Howard Govt had kids behind razor wire for years. That is not what is happening now with our changes. JG
Every year you are on our heads, and your country is watered by your wisdom and wisdom as the earth watered on the day of your birth. God gave you days with the number of rain beads. #JO
Every year, our Majesty Jordan and Jordan are good. We wish Your Majesty a long life and a year of peace and prosperity under your wise leadership

President Sleiman called the concerned authorities to arrange a safe return for lebanese citizens in #Egypt
A hotline has been set up to assist lebanese citizens in #Egypt at the following number: 0020169860640
The Australian Government is providing an emergency flight out of Cairo for Australians affected by the unrest in Egypt. http://j.mp/i3a33z
Australians wishing to register for the charter flight from Cairo should contact DFAT on +61 2 6261 3305 from o/s or 1300 555 135 from Aust.

Sleiman voiced the importance of maintaining national unity and security to strengthen democracy in Lebanon
Sleiman said a cabinet that addresses current issues and ongoing up on social and administrative demands must be formed
@iodyssee Yes it has all been very bizy for me but fine thank u

@Ethnicsupplies Ooh sori,shd give u fdbck sOon too,thanks! I want RDB(Rwanda Devlpnt Board) to handle these issues tho!
@ShokolaCafe. I would encourage the stake holders to sit,discuss n find an amicable solution!!!
@ShokolaCafe. I cant put a definitive answer to it right away...!
@itsmamaafrika. I promise won't go beyond this week b4 u get reply...thanks
@jewELLAHry. Happy for u for the course n thank u!!
@jtmorri This claim going around that the levy won't be collected for 17 or 18 months is untrue. The levy will be collected from 1 July. JG
It will take more than luck to shape the future we want. http://j.mp/gszxtm JG
@Kirralie I agree Aussies are compassionate & support each other.  I am an optimist about the future we can shape together. JG
@mugumya. If u r a good student of history as u argue others to be,then remember where Rw.has come from too,to be where it s now....!
@mugumya And if u r that good student also remember that situations may have similarities but they will never be exactly the same...!
@mugumya I dont kno what u have chosen to compare about the 2 situatns but one clear difference is how we have dealt with corruption...
@mugumya and other issues of accountability...u may rest assured that other people can also be in charge of what works best for them....!
@mugumya. I agree with that....about not keeping their word-examples are many, but we may not want to use it against those who keep thr word
@mugumya. Or those who really want to keep their word
@mugumya. I can n do u/stand your n many others frustration for being let down...let us all together keep up the struggle to get things rite
@kwetha. Thats rite...we r happy for things going that way on our s/mrkt...thank u
@mugumya. Well,on size n efficiency of our govt,it a matter of choice we have made driven by desire to deliver..for our ppl's benefit..!
@josephpowell. It s alwz going to be a complicated questn...while I can stand for what I say n do- it s hard to do that for smbody else..
@josephpowell but I want n i kno others want to see things continue in good direction..in Rw. So it s in my interest n duty to work with ..
@josephpowell ..with others to manage well that succession process...and we will!
RT @pPlassen: Invited @bttrine and @jensstoltenberg to talk about "Learning Bjørndal's Method" in #Norgesglasset today! Important with bullying ...
@Natabaalo. I am not sure what that means...but I wish 1-gov'ts r those that really represent n work for their ppl 2-outspoken journalists..
@Natabaalo ...means, those who have a sense of accountability n responsibility ...! N really invest in their time n effort to analyse issues
@Natabaalo. Journalists,outspoken or not,since they r point(s) of refence on issues that affect pple,they'd better hold themselves to some..
@Natabaalo ..high standard!
@Natabaalo. U cud actually come and help to add to its flourishing..may be you ve done so..but I am sure nobody has stopped u doing so!
@Natabaalo from almost nothing,a decade n half ago to 70 local newspapers n 2 dozen fm radios n free flow of foreign media i dont ..
@Natabaalo see who stopped it flourishing as u say other than the very low base at which we found it like everything else..capacity is probm
@primusagaba. Easy,n every1 can say that about voices n equitable..it how it gets sorted out for the overall outcome that suits the majority
@primusagaba n I am sure u r not having one place on another in mind-it's also global! It's channelling the so many different views n ..
@primusagaba ..interests n coming up wth something that works n moving on ..! It goes on n on..
@Natabaalo. I bet u r not from outside our sub-region,not far,wud it be diffcult for u to visit Rw n see n hear n ask n be more info.
@Natabaalo ..about some of these issues u may be wondering about...it really makes a diffrnce! That s if u have interest as u seem to!
@Natabaalo. Report by who ..? Those reporters never talk about the will n choices n expressions of the people of Rw as Rwse see n want it
@Natabaalo they will call this or that vague...what wudnt u call vague if that s what u want...U n Me,may be served well by being ourslvs..
@Natabaalo. I did say no.of outlets translate ....but the totality of what i said meant Rwse have,our freedom(s) to be seen in various ways
@Natabaalo ..n we still have long way to be where we want to be almost on everythg but we r doing our best ...we will get there sooner!
@Natabaalo. What I dont appreciate is ppl from anywhere; 1-telling me they r the ones who define what s right to us! 2-pretending they ...
@Natabaalo. ...they have no biases or interests of their own...!
@Natabaalo. Good day to u n thank u!
@mugumya. But not easy to hide the wrong one may do behind that claim...the truth catches up with u! Thats the beauty of it!
@mugumya. N the principle remains valid that ppl have to define themselves..then HOW will make u or break U...!
@mugumya. I u/stand
@mugumya. WE will alwz do our best for our best! The good thing if I may use tht-our pple have learnd alot from our tragic history ...
@mugumya ...and want and r committed to doing n being better! We just have to encourage n develop leaders to do their part with pple
@caseylush. True,I am looking forward...,to be at USIU!
Carlos Slim Helu sends letter to Pr. Sleiman, thanks him for warm reception & sets up a fund for lebanon with initial amount of $ 50million
Thank you for your kind letters. In accordance with God our new Prime Minister. I will stay in touch with you as a proud Jordanian citizen.
@mandelams. Thank u ..!
I want to say it for the Network: in spite of the imperial interests, the sovereignty of the Egyptian People will be imposed! Viva Nasser!

In Townsville. Police, emergency services & the army doing a great job. Problems with power & water but people are smiling & saying hi! JG
@buddyblanc The Egyptian people want freedom & democracy. We're saying there must be peaceful change so they can shape their future. JG
